DOC.brief_summary: The study conduct see whether CP-690,550 ointment potential safe effective treatment adult patient mild moderate chronic plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: CP-690-550 Ointment For Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate chronic plaque psoriasis ( psoriasis vulgaris ) , duration least 6 month ; A target plaque least 9 sq . cm . Demonstrates `` rebound '' `` flare '' chronic plaque psoriasis ; Non plaque form psoriasis ; Currently history psoriatic arthritis ; Current drug induce psoriasis ; Currently systemic therapy systemic therapy psoriasis within previous 6 month ; Currently phototherapy psoriasis phototherapy within previous 3 month
